description:
Vovsoft Web Platform Identifier is a powerful program, designed for desktop and laptop computers, that automatically recognizes websites based on their platform such as WordPress, Shopify, vBulletin and hundreds more.

Vovsoft Web Platform Identifier is a powerful program, designed for desktop and laptop computers, that automatically recognizes websites based on their platform such as WordPress, Shopify, vBulletin and hundreds more.

Discover the power of seamless web platform identification with this tool, a simple software designed to effortlessly scan and unveil the underlying platform of any entered URL. Whether you're a web developer, designer, or simply curious about the technologies driving your favorite websites, this tool is your go-to solution for accurate and rapid platform recognition.

Say goodbye to the guesswork! This easy to use utility employs advanced algorithms to swiftly analyze the structure of websites, pinpointing the exact web platform they are built upon. No more manual investigation â€“ let the software do the heavy lifting for you. Our software boasts an extensive database of web platforms, including but not limited to WordPress, Joomla, Drupal, and more. As new platforms emerge, our library stays up-to-date, ensuring you receive the most accurate results every time. Designed with user experience in mind, the program's intuitive interface ensures smooth navigation for users of all levels. Simply enter the URL list you wish to analyze, and watch as the software instantaneously provides the platform verdict.
